mapper.sql: select a.article_id,a.category_id,c.category_name,a.title,a.summary, a.author,a.original,a.create_time,a.update_time,a.template, a.total_clicks,a.keywords,a.content,c.category_path,a.cover_path,a.status from con_article_info a left join con_category c on a.category_id=c.category_id where a.status>0
mapper.select: select a.article_id,a.create_time,a.update_time from con_article_info a order by a.create_time desc limit ${startRow},#{limit}
select count(1) from con_article_info a where a.status>0
mapper.delete: delete from con_picture where source_id=#{value} and type=#{type}
mapper.update: update con_article_info set title=#{title}, author=#{author}, original=#{original}, template=#{template}, update_time=now(), keywords=#{keywords}, summary=#{summary}, content=#{content}, category_id=#{category_id}, cover_path=#{cover_path}, status=#{status} where article_id=#{article_id}
update con_article_info set status=0 where article_id=#{article_id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.module_id, m.module_code, m.module_name, m.create_time, m.display_rows FROM con_module m where not exists(select 1 from con_module_article a where a.article_id=#{value} and a.module_id=m.module_id)

SELECT m.module_id, m.module_code, m.module_name, m.create_time, m.display_rows FROM con_module m where exists (select 1 from con_module_article a where a.article_id=#{value} and a.module_id=m.module_id)

and exists(select 1 from con_module m inner join con_module_article art on m.module_id=art.module_id and m.module_id=#{module_id} where art.article_id=a.article_id) order by a.update_time desc limit #{display_rows}

SELECT m.module_id, m.module_code, m.module_name, m.create_time, m.display_rows FROM con_module m where exists(select 1 from con_module_position a where a.position=#{value} and a.module_id=m.module_id)
select count(1) from con_article_tag where tag_id=#{value}
